list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hit or try to hit with a swinging blow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she swiped me right across the nose
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy quẹt tôi ngay trên mũi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass (a swipe card) through an electronic device designed to read and process the information encoded on it.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: someone swiped one of his sausages
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ai đó quẹt một trong những xúc xích của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he missed the ball with his first swipe
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh bỏ lỡ quả bóng với cú vuốt đầu tiên của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or instance of moving one's finger across a touchscreen to activate a function.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a swipe to the right archives or deletes the message
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một vuốt sang lưu trữ bên phải hoặc xóa tin nhắn
